an10.16:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an10.16:1.3: Tathagato araham sammasambuddho, paccekabuddho, ubhatobhagavimutto, pannavimutto, kayasakkhi, ditthippatto, saddhavimutto, saddhanusari, dhammanusari, gotrabhu—
an10.16:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa puggala ahuneyya …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
